sentences: Filippo Neviani (born 6 January 1972), known by his stage name Nek, is an Italian singer-songwriter and musician.
section: N/A

sentences: Nek is popular in Italy and throughout the Spanish-speaking world, and has performed and released most of his albums in both Italian and Spanish.
section: N/A

sentences: Nek first gained international success in 1997, when he took part in the Sanremo Music Festival in the Big Artists section, and although he didn't win, the song "Laura non c'è" (in Spanish: "Laura no está") went on to become his international breakthrough as it became a major hit in Europe and Latin America that year, as well the release of his fourth and million-selling album Lei, gli amici e tutto il resto, which was his first album to also be recorded in a Spanish language.
section: N/A

sentences: After eighteen years he performed at the Sanremo's 2015 edition with the song "Fatti avanti amore" where he reached second place.
section: N/A

sentences: During his career he has released thirteen studio albums and forty-eight singles, which include hits "Sei solo tu", "Almeno stavolta", "Lascia che io sia", "Instabile", "La voglia che non-vorrei", and it has been reported that he has sold over 10 million records.
section: N/A

sentences: Filippo Neviani was born on 6 January 1972, in Sassuolo, Modena, Italy.

sentences: He began playing drums, bass and guitar at nine years of age.
section: == Biography == | === 1972–1991: Early life and first music activity ===

sentences: He was especially influenced by country musicians like John Denver, and later Sting.
section: == Biography == | === 1972–1991: Early life and first music activity ===

sentences: In the late 1980s he began searching for a well-defined expressive identity and started playing in small clubs with his country music-oriented band "Winchester", and subsequently enjoyed budding notoriety in the Bologna province with soft-rock band "White Lady".

sentences: In the 1991 began his solo career when came second at the Castrocaro Music Festival, which at the time represented a major promotional opportunity for emerging artists.

sentences: In 1997 he took part in the Sanremo Music Festival in the Big Artists section, with the song "Laura non c'è" which although it failed to win the Festival, it became that year's edition's greatest hit.

sentences: The huge success of "Laura non c'è" boosted sales of the album Lei, gli amici e tutto il resto (re-released), which went 6 times platinum, selling over 600,000 copies in Italy alone.

sentences: That same year Nek also took part in the Festivalbar with the song "Sei grande", and debuted on the European market; The rush-released Spanish version of the album was released in May, while complete in September; according to WEA Italy Nek sold 300,000 albums in Spain and 100,000 in France, with additional 250,000 copies of "Laura non c'è" in France.
section: == Biography == | === 1992–1999: The beginning of the success, Lei, gli amici e tutto il resto, In due ===

sentences: His sixth album La vita è was released worldwide on 2 June 2000, and peaked at number eight on the charts in Italy, and seventh in Switzerland, selling over 360,000 copies in both languages.

sentences: Two years later, on 24 May 2002, his seventh album Le cose da difendere was released, once again worldwide, and it peaked at number four on the charts in Italy, and stayed in the Top 5 for 4 weeks, being certified Platinum in Italy, and Gold in Switzerland.
section: == Biography == | === 2000–2007: La vita è, Le cose da difendere, Una parte di me, Nella stanza 26 ===

sentences: On 10 October 2003, his first greatest hits compilation was released, The Best of Nek: L'anno zero, in both the Italian and Spanish versions.
section: == Biography == | === 2000–2007: La vita è, Le cose da difendere, Una parte di me, Nella stanza 26 ===

sentences: It crowned the successful 10 years by offering hits taken from the seven previous albums, plus two unreleased tracks, "Almeno stavolta" and "L'anno zero".

sentences: 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 16 April 2013, his eleventh studio album was released under the title Filippo Neviani and went on to peak at number two in the music charts.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: All the tracks on the album were played by Nek.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: The album followed on from the hit single "Congiunzione Astrale", on 22 March 2013.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: The following single "La metà di niente" was also re-recorded in Spanish as "La Mitad de Nada" in a duet with Sergio Dalma.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: In 2014, Nek received the Lunezia award in the "Pop Rock" category for the album due to musical-literary value.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 11 May, Nek performed at the RadioItalia Live concert in Piazza Duomo, Milan.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: In June performed at the charity concert "Nel nome del cuore" at Assisi, in July performed at Foro Italico in Rome, and at Reventon Music Festival, at the sold-out Staples Center in Los Angeles.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 23 September, he performed at the La Mercè Festival in Barcelona.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 3 October, Nek's European Tour was cancelled because of health issues with vocal cords, for which in order to avoid surgery was not allowed to sing for two months.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: In 2014, Nek received the "Tributo ad Augusto," award given every year to the artist who is distinguished by his artistic and social activity.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 28 March, as honorary president, Nek presented the 17th Magna Grecia Awards, exhibition dedicated to the beauty, culture and art inspired by Magna Grecia which takes place every year in Apulia.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 1 September, performed live at the humanitary football match "Partita Interreligiosa per la Pace", at Stadio Olimpico, Rome.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: In February 2015, Nek participated at the 65th Sanremo Music Festival, where with the song "Fatti avanti amore" he finished in second place.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: Although he didn't win the main competition, he won with the song "Se Telefonando" by Mina for the "Best Cover", and with his song "Fatti avanti amore" another three awards, for the "Best Arrangement" awarded by the festival orchestra, the newsroom Radio and TV "Lucio Dalla," as well radio award "Sempre più Sanremo" for the most popular festival song on radio.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 4 March Nek released his twelfth studio album Prima di parlare, followed by a national tour in autumn.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: The album, as well the two singles, were certified Platinum by FIMI.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: In 2016, Nek was a coach in the 15th edition of the talent show Amici di Maria De Filippi.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: In May was released single "Uno di questi giorni" which was certified Gold by FIMI.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: In July performed at Reventon, festival dedicated to the Latin American music, at Microsoft Theatre in Los Angeles, while in October at the "Football for Peace" in Rome organized by Pope Francis.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: On 14 October was released his thirteenth studio album Unici.
section: == Biography == | === 2013–present: Filippo Neviani, Prima di parlare, Unici ===

sentences: It will be followed by nationwide tour in the spring and summer of 2017, as well on 21 May 2017 with his first concert at Verona Arena.
